comment: Always good food!
Always early, always hot. Good food- prompt service.
I usually come to this diner in person, but ordered delivery today, it was just as good, arrived quickly and delivery person was friendly. Great food.
Forget the art of order, when it was delivered it was burnt and inedible. Still waiting on refund. Food was disgusting
Good. Food was hot

OMG!!!  OMG!!!!   OMG!!!!  Seamless, Seamless, Seamless.....  I was throwing up all night long. I never cried and was nauseous and vomiting all night long. And I have found the source if my feeling I'll. It's a good thing I didnot enter and got admitted in the E.R. I really really dont know how low have your freaking g standards has gone down low. I took pictures of my favorite pies in the whole world!  It was the pumpkin pie that had the mold on the side. There were 2 slices that was delivered along with the chocolate shake that I ordered. I took a picture for all of Hells Kitchen to see what and how much disgusting food is not seen by a typical eater.
Typical diner burger, decent
This extra “$2” delivery fee is absolutely RIDICULOUS. The food is already OVERPRICED enough.
Love The Flame!!
I ordered a lemonade but got lemon water because there wasn’t any sugar in it

The food itself was good, but it was quite late. When we called to see where it was the guy who answered the phone was extremely rude and just said “yeah yeah it’ll get there when it gets there” and then immediately hung up. Won’t be ordering from here again.
There was barely any feta in the feta omelette. The "toast" was just bread out of a bag, not toasted
Horrible. Everything was beyond overcooked and they got my order wrong. Will never order from there again. So disappointed

We received a bad piece of salmon and they would not refund the cost.  We order from this diner all the time but not any more. There are so many other restaurants that are worth your money. Skip this one.

I had an issue with my first order taking over an hour to come, but the delivery guy was new. The manager refunded me for the cold food and apologized so many times. The next time i ordered the ordered my food came in literally less than 20minutes, I think they remembered my address. I appreciate them being quick and making up for the first bad experience. The chicken tenders were really good + fries. Milkshakes are good too!
Delicious, cheap and fast
Just saw that they started charging 2$ per order and called to make sure. They guy gave me attitude. Never ordering from this place again. This is NYC.
Had the chicken Parmesan.  It was fine(not great) but the there was hardly any tomato sauce on the spaghetti and the little bit there was very watery so went to bottom of the container

A little pricey but it's my go-to for diner food.  The food is always good, and unlike other places in the neighborhood (I'm lookin' at YOU, Olympic Flame Diner), they take care to prepare your meal as requested and deliver as quickly as possible.  And I have never, ever had to wait longer than 20 minutes for a delivery, even if the estimated wait time was longer than 45 min.  These guys have earned my loyalty!
The best grilled cheese with bacon I've ever had

I always order from here because they are usually fast and good. But today a bit disappointed, I ordered my Avocado wrap grilled chicken.  There was NO avocado in it.  Literally called an Avocado wrap and you miss the most important thing in the wrap.  Soo disappointed.
horrible place, missing the coffee but don't dare to call,they will hang up on you
$2 delivery fee has been added to the orders now, good bye Flame
I am familiar with the diner, so I knew what to expect. The meal was good and I was happy with that quality of my order
I've ordered from here dozens of times.  It's diner food, and if that's what you're looking for, this is pretty much as good as it gets!
My food never showed up
I love the flame
If you need good quality food in the middle of the night, Flame is a worthy choice.  They haven't let me down yet.

Do not trust...
They failed to deliver to my home within the time frame asked. 
Do not trust...
They did not send my food to me after I called to ask for my food. They said that they had thrown my food away.

I waited 4 hours to contact them after I realized my 100 dollar order was not here. I wasn't that hungry nor was I waiting for them....so when i noticed that my nearly 100 dollar order was not here, i called and they said that i needed to pay again to get my order delivered... I said why...he said because their person tried to deliver it but nobody answered..... 
.
.
So I guess this person I talked to at Flame Diner is called Sedom? I think that's what he said on the phone.
.
.
I asked what he could do to make this right, he said I need to pay again to get my purchase delivered.
.
.
i don't think they understand that i have a doorman....so if they tried to deliver it to me, my doorman would have let me know...so...in other words....my 100 dollar order was not delivered so i do not trust them.
Everything was soggy and very greasy (too much butter/oil). Don't recommend.
Took forever, food was cold.  My favorite part was the delivery guy told us we ordered to late (8:30).  Will not be ordering again.
I have eaten there a few times, they give hospital workers a discount!
Super rude took almost two hours
Delivery person awful. Took me 30minutes to guide him to a very well known cross street and building. Food was not even luke warm. Horrendous experience.

Food was good! Ordered the gyro breakfast and eggs. The eggs were supposed to be poached. One was. The other may have broke during transportation? But it wasn’t intact. The gyro meat came alone. Two slices of rye, no butter. The salad was good, but had some brown pieces in it; it wasn’t fresh lettuce. Overall great though. Giving another chance.
The chicken soup we ordered was horrible, directly out of a campbells can

I ordered two baked potatoes fully loaded The restaurant sent me two raw potatoes wrapped in aluminum foil completely empty, without butter, without any seasoning, they did not pay attention to any of my requests in the order
I was feeling under the weather, this odd combo of meals cured my nausea ! Very pleased  !
I will be calling customer service to discuss.
The milkshake was mostly milk and super watery. The fries were just the thin, frozen kind. Mc Donald’s fries are better tbh.
Always great food and on time deliveries.  Their fries are always delicious!
They forgot the saltines
hash browns/home fries were way under cooked. not worth the $18 i paid for an omelete.
It was great!
The food was great and the delivery was earlier than anticipated.
They forgot to put bbq sauce on my bbq Alpine burger!!!
Quick delivery, tasty food.
My fave diner
I NEVER RECEIVED MY ORDER
Delivery is extremely fast, kind, on time. Food is delicious.
This is my favorite thing to order from the flame. The grilled chicken on pita is always amazing!
The best diner in the neighborhood!
LOVE THE PLACE
Chicken salad was very bland

The wrong food was delivered to me. Then when I meet the delivery guy with the right food he made me return upstairs to get the other order he delivered which I find gross because it should not be reused. Also, by the time I was given the correct food it was completely cold and not at all worth the money. Definitely will not order from again.
Run of the mill
Typical greek rude diner
food was good,customer service sucks!!
Food came faster then expected and it was great
EVERYONE better try it!
Food cold, broccoli very hard (as if wasn’t cooked), happens a lot.

Typical Greek Diner , staff is rude and confrontational when you question your bill that will change with each order,counter guy is dizzy and cant get it right. Cashier has more important things to do then take your cash.
Last few orders have been stale. Dont get a soda,come in a plastic cup jammed with ice and very little soda,get a can
over priced food ,cold and most of the time it looks to have been sitting for awhile

Usually go in to eat but counter guy is dizzy and cant get the order right,give you want he wants and the price changed everyday. So seamless was the way to go. NOT!!  Buyer beware,you are paying a fee to order online for the flame diner. Mangers use the Menu is INCORRECT and they adj price without your knowledge. after 3 years of this ,NEVER AGAIN WITH FLAME DINER!!
opened the can and dumped it on the pita oil and all.

The Philly cheesesteak was tasteless. Also, I paid $2.75 for a cup of ice with a spritz of coke in it. I’m not exaggerating at all when I say it was gone after one sip. Definitely will not be reordering from here.
Always good food, always quick delivery, always good value.
tasted stale and chewy at the same time. would not order again. For a nyc diner, it has sub-par nyc diner food.
Always excellent - great food and service!
My onion rings were burnt and burger very overcooked and dry! When i asked for it Medium! It didnt have any swiss cheese like it said it came with... very disappointed!!
Happy they are open late. Lots of menu options. Food was good. Delivery was ok. I'd order from them again if I had no other options.
Food was good, portions were very generous
Always a go-to for good food and almost always really fast delivery.
terrible; ice cold.
The food wasn’t as warm as I would’ve liked, but otherwise a good experience.

I love going to The Flame in person, but ordering on Seamless has thus far been a poor experience. The first time it was a half hour late and wrong; today it was on time but wrong and cold. I’m disappointed. :(
The chicken wings were way overpriced, especially since it didn't come with fries as the menu indicated
The jalapeño poppers were lovely, the wings not so much.
Always fast and delicious.
Description inaccurate. Expected way more fruit per description and price. Very stingy with fruit. Also did not follow directions on adding whipped topping.
Love this place.
Great food but the order wasn't correct
I usually love The Flame, but today, the food was 20 minutes late and cold.
Great service and solid food
Food was good. Delivery was fast!
Never got the order. I want a credit now
They took an hour to deliver an ice-cold omelet, then had the stones to come pick up the crappy cold food instead of comping it.
Food was good
Always delicious and always on time /or early
Left out delivery items (soda) and had to redeliver them well after the meal was done.
Food is good, but my delivery was cold
Ordered a burger and it was good but bun was burned. Lots of fries came with the order.
onion soup was disgusting.  salt water and rubber cheese.
I ordered buffalo wings with blue cheese and I got regular wings and no blue cheese. The mozzarella sticks marinara sauce were not that great either quite frankly

The burger was overcooked and burnt.  The milkshake tasted awful and was melted.  The soda’s ice was also melted.  The wrap was soggy.  The fries were actually not soggy, but couldn’t make up for everything else.  Very disappointing.
They sent me the wrong food
Great diner food and always always timely!!
Please Deng tender the cream cheese
You should make soup croutons
I asked for Meunster cheese,  not mushrooms.

NEVER ORDER HERE!!! They are incredibly rude, mess up orders, don’t deliver and will fight you if you question them. So rude. It was shocking how rude. I’ve ordered from them because they’re the only option late at night but now I will gladly sooner go hungry than give them business. Be warned!!!

So disappointed with my order. They’ve always been great in the past but in the last two weeks the food quality has unfortunately declined to throwing it away. My last several orders have been either cold, incorrect, or a combination and very late.

I am incredibly sad but three times in 10 days my food has been incorrect. It’s sad to say but unfortunately something has changed in their kitchen I’ve always been a very loyal order but I’ve now been burnt three times in 10 days.
This is the third time in 10 days that my order has been messed up. Unfortunately, disputed how much I used to love them something has gone wrong.
This is the third time in 10 days they are messed up my order. $60 in total that unfortunately is just lost.
great food, prompt delivery

I absolutely love the diner, unfortunately, twice in the course of one week my food has been delivered 20 to 35 minutes late and tonight it was delivered cold. 

I hate to leave a bad review and I did not do so earlier in the week but twice in one week is disappointing.
They worked so quickly and our food was still warm and everything was delicious. They even did a special request for us with no questions asked. Loved them!
Excellent Greek salad!
Delicious food, quick service!
Always on time . And great service
Chicken noodle soup was chicken rice soup. Incorrect order.
The food was delivered over 2 hours after placing the order, and it was ice cold. When we called the restaurant to inquire
It was very good! Will order from here again!!

The burger was inedible and disgusting.  The food is very overpriced.  But delivery was quick and the soup was good.  The open-face turkey sandwich was at least a good size portion but lacked flavor and was expensive.  Wouldn’t order from here again.
Fast delivery. Mediocre fries
Late Delivery. Got my order wrong and food was generally bland. Milkshake was good. Will not be ordering again.
Great soup. Grilled cheese was a little undercooked.

My food arrived and it was complete.
No complaint there, but it was a bit on the bland side And my mashpotatoes were very sour. Tasted like greek yogurt. Im assuming the cream or milk used expired. You can assume how the next couples hours were for me...
Delivery is always fast and friendly. Standard diner fare, quality can be hit or miss but usually hits the spot. 4 stars bumped up to 5 as a counter to Elvis really not liking his eggs
Everytime I get food from here and its fried (fries, mozzarella sticks) it always arrives burnt
Just poor quality food
Bad burned food and rude and disrespectful staff. DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY AND TIME!!!!
Don’t order from this place! The food is bad and the staff is rude.
Food was burned and staff were very rude when I called them
The food is poorly prepared and burned. I try to contact the restaurant but they were extremely rude and disrespectful.
Burned food called the restaurant and the staff was extremely rude.
Horrible costumer service and burned food
The worst food and very disrespectful staff
They didn't call when they were here. We ordered a chocolate milkshake and we got chocolate milk. They food was really god though!!
Forgot one of our entrees
Onion rings were cold, ordered at 1am got my order at 2:30am BURGER WAS DELICIOUS
Just because the restaurant is busy that is no excuse for terrible customer service and serving slop for food.
They usually screw up something on the order - for example, when I order and pay for cheese, my order doesn’t have cheese.
Microwaved burnt chicken cutlet doesn't get easier to eat under melted mozzarella.  I couldn't bite through it and had to toss it.  Surprisingly the pasta, arguably tougher to deliver, was very good.
Got my usual order, but ordered cheese on my eggs and there was no cheese :/
It was ok, I've had better hash and home fries.
Muffin was burned and grilled cheese dry. Not up to usual standards.
Order was so fast and delicious! Such a friendly delivery man, too.
The food was delivered to the wrong address. Not sure why. Wrong address on receipt. But I love The Flame and they are always good for price and service.
Love the Flame Dinner!
